Package aips.search

Class ActionStatePair

java.lang.Object
aips.search.ActionStatePair
public class ActionStatePair
extends java.lang.Object
When a node is expanded, the successor function generates a list of action-state pairs. Each pair represents the action which can be applied to the current state, and the new state after the application. This class models such a action-state pair.
Author:
K. Hui

    Modifier and Type Field Description

    The action part of this pair.

  • Field Details

    • action

      public Action action
      The action part of this pair. This should be a customised sub-class object of Action, that models an action in your domain.

    • state

      public State state
      The state after the action is applied to the current state. This should be a customised object that implements the State interface, modelling the problem state in your domain.

    • ActionStatePair

      state - The state component of the pair.

      Returns:
      A String representation of the action-state pair.
